org.apache.commons.io.output

Class TeeWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Writer
      • org.apache.commons.io.output.FilterCollectionWriter
        • org.apache.commons.io.output.ProxyCollectionWriter
          • org.apache.commons.io.output.TeeWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, Appendable, AutoCloseable

    public class TeeWriter
extends ProxyCollectionWriter
    Classic splitter of Writer. Named after the Unix 'tee' command. It allows a stream to be branched off so there are now two streams.

    This currently a only convenience class with the proper name "TeeWriter".

    Since:
    2.7
